languages.text: The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} is used to determine additional damage dealt with ranged {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Deals 5% more damage for every 10 points in Demolition (instead of 5% for each 10 points of Intelligence).
languages.original_text: Солдат использует {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Взрывотехнику{/g} вместо {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g}, чтобы наносить дополнительный урон дальнобойными {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаками по области{/g}. Наносит на 5% больше урона за каждые 10 очков Взрывотехники (вместо 5% за каждые 10 единиц Интеллекта).

traits.locale_text: The Soldier's Demolition instead of Intelligence is used to determine additional damage dealt with ranged area attacks. Deals 5% more damage for every 10 points in Demolition (instead of 5% for each 10 points of Intelligence).

The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} is used to determine additional damage dealt with ranged {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Deals 5% more damage for every 10 points in Demolition (instead of 5% for each 10 points of Intelligence).

The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} is used to determine additional damage dealt with ranged {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Deals 5% more damage for every 10 points in Demolition (instead of 5% for each 10 points of Intelligence).

languages.text: Солдат использует {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Взрывотехнику{/g} вместо {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g}, чтобы наносить дополнительный урон дальнобойными {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаками по области{/g}. Наносит на 5% больше урона за каждые 10 очков Взрывотехники (вместо 5% за каждые 10 единиц Интеллекта).
languages.original_text: The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} is used to determine additional damage dealt with ranged {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Deals 5% more damage for every 10 points in Demolition (instead of 5% for each 10 points of Intelligence).

languages.text: Le soldat utilise la {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g} au lieu de l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} pour infliger des dégâts supplémentaires avec ses {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} à distance. Il inflige 5 % de dégâts supplémentaires par tranche de 10 points de Démolition (au lieu de 5 % par tranche de 10 points d'Intelligence).
languages.original_text: The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} is used to determine additional damage dealt with ranged {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Deals 5% more damage for every 10 points in Demolition (instead of 5% for each 10 points of Intelligence).

traits.locale_text: Le Soldat utilise la Démolition au lieu de l'Intelligence pour infliger des dégâts supplémentaires avec ses attaques de zone à distance. Il inflige 5 % de dégâts supplémentaires par tranche de 10 points de Démolition (au lieu de 5 % par tranche de 10 points d'Intelligence).

Le soldat utilise la {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g} au lieu de l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} pour infliger des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires avec ses {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}. Il inflige 5 % de dégâts supplémentaires par tranche de 10 points de Démolition (au lieu de 5 % par tranche de 10 points d'Intelligence).

Le soldat utilise la {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Démolition{/g} au lieu de l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} pour infliger des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires avec ses {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaques de zone{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Range}à distance{/g}. Il inflige 5 % de dégâts supplémentaires par tranche de 10 points de Démolition (au lieu de 5 % par tranche de 10 points d'Intelligence).

languages.text: Statt der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} des Soldaten wird seine {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Zerstörung{/g} genutzt, um den zusätzlichen Schaden zu ermitteln, der durch {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} aus der Ferne verursacht wird. Fügt pro 10 Punkten in Zerstörung 5 % mehr Schaden zu (anstatt 5 % mehr pro 10 Punkten in Intelligenz).
languages.original_text: The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} is used to determine additional damage dealt with ranged {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Deals 5% more damage for every 10 points in Demolition (instead of 5% for each 10 points of Intelligence).

traits.locale_text: Der Soldat verwendet Zerstörung anstatt Intelligenz, um mit Fernkampf-Flächenangriffen Zusatzschaden zuzufügen. Fügt pro 10 Punkten in Zerstörung 5 % mehr Schaden zu (anstatt 5 % mehr pro 10 Punkten in Intelligenz).

Statt der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} des Soldaten wird seine {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Zerstörung{/g} genutzt, um den zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu ermitteln, der durch {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriffe{/g} aus der {g|Encyclopedia:Range}Ferne{/g} verursacht wird. Fügt pro 10 Punkten in Zerstörung 5 % mehr Schaden zu (anstatt 5 % mehr pro 10 Punkten in Intelligenz).

languages.text: ソルジャーは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}ではなく{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}解体{/g}を用いて遠距離{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}の追加ダメージを与える。解体10ポイントにつき、ダメージが5%増加する（INT10ポイントにつき5%の代わりに）
languages.original_text: The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} is used to determine additional damage dealt with ranged {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Deals 5% more damage for every 10 points in Demolition (instead of 5% for each 10 points of Intelligence).

traits.locale_text: ソルジャーは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}ではなく{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}解体{/g}を用いて遠距離{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}の追加ダメージを与える。解体10ポイントにつき、ダメージが5%増加する（INT10ポイントにつき5%の代わりに）

ソルジャーは{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}ではなく{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}解体{/g}を用いて{g|Encyclopedia:Range}遠距離{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。解体10ポイントにつき、ダメージが5%増加する（知性10ポイントにつき5%の代わりに）。

languages.text: 士兵在进行远程{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}时，造成的额外伤害不再取决于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}，而是取决于{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}爆破{/g}技能。士兵每有10点爆破技能（而非每有10点智力），远程范围攻击造成的伤害提高5%。
languages.original_text: The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} is used to determine additional damage dealt with ranged {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Deals 5% more damage for every 10 points in Demolition (instead of 5% for each 10 points of Intelligence).

traits.locale_text: 士兵在进行{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}时，造成的额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}不再取决于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}，而是取决于{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}爆破{/g}技能。士兵每有10点爆破技能（而非每有10点智力），远程范围攻击造成的伤害提高5%。

士兵在进行{g|Encyclopedia:Range}远程{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}时，造成的额外{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}不再取决于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}，而是取决于{g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}爆破{/g}技能。士兵每有10点爆破技能（而非每有10点智力），远程范围攻击造成的伤害提高5%。

languages.text: Se usa la puntuación de {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolición{/g} del soldado en lugar de la de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} para calcular el daño adicional con los {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataques de área{/g} a distancia. Inflige un 5 % más de daño por cada 10 puntos de Demolición (en lugar de 5 % por cada 10 puntos de Inteligencia).
languages.original_text: The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} is used to determine additional damage dealt with ranged {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Deals 5% more damage for every 10 points in Demolition (instead of 5% for each 10 points of Intelligence).

traits.locale_text: El soldado usa Demolición en lugar de Inteligencia para infligir daño adicional con los ataques de área a distancia. Inflige un 5 % más de daño por cada 10 puntos de Demolición (en lugar de 5 % por cada 10 puntos de Inteligencia).

languages.text: Asker'in menzilli {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırılarında{/g} vereceği ilave hasar belirlenirken {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} niteliği yerine {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Tahribat{/g} yeteneği kullanılır. Tahribat'taki her 10 puanı için %5 daha fazla hasar verir (Zekâ'daki her 10 puanı için %5 yerine).
languages.original_text: The Soldier's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillDemolition}Demolition{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} is used to determine additional damage dealt with ranged {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attacks{/g}. Deals 5% more damage for every 10 points in Demolition (instead of 5% for each 10 points of Intelligence).
